dcterms:description: The MNIST-DVS dataset contains labelled 26 Ã— 26 spiking signals of duration L = 80 samples, recorded from a DVS camera that observes handwritten digits '1' and '7' displayed on a screen. It includes 900 examples from each class for training and 100 examples for testing.
dcterms:title: MNIST-DVS
